statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_management ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_management WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity * price AS total_price FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity >= 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity > 0 AND price < 100;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory_management WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity <= 10 ORDER BY product_name LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 ORDER BY product_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory_management WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY quantity DESC, product_name
SELECT * FROM Inventory
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND price < 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_name FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity_ordered FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_ordered) AS total_ordered FROM Orders GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_ordered > 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Orders INNER JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT MAX(quantity_ordered) AS max_quantity_ordered FROM Orders;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Inventory GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_name FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE quantity < 5
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, units_in_stock FROM inventory ORDER BY units_in_stock DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price < 50;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_id, product_name, units_in_stock, price FROM inventory WHERE units_in_stock > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, description FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT od.order_id, od.product_id, p.product_name, od.quantity, od.unit_price FROM order_details od JOIN products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id WHERE od.quantity >= 10 ORDER BY od.quantity DESC, p.product_name ASC;
